10.title: Special Edition: Little Einsteins East Africa Science Fair 2017

episode of.title: The S.T.E.M Adventures of Kabi and Sasha (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: The first of an Annual Science Fair where children get to explore and parents learn all about Little Einsteins East Africa.

imdb.plot outline: Little Einsteins East Africa believes that Science Exploration in young children begins with Fun and sets the basis for a lifelong interest and knowledge of Science, technology and Engineering and Mathematics. STEM Learning. Little Einsteins East Africa TV seeks to provide an audiovisual forum for Children and Parents to learn Science and Have Fun.
